name: Alternate Classes of the Hecate Sector
name_original: Alternate Classes of the Hecate Sector
description:
Alternate Classes from the Hecate Sector is a zine collecting 3 new classes for your next Mothership session. The sturdy and resilient Rim Farmer, the rough and tumble Asteroid Miner, and the strange and mysterious Void Musician. Each class is fleshed out with stat/save bonuses, starting skills and 10 unique loadouts for each! At the end, you'll also find 4 tables to help fill out your crews journey into the rimward Hecate Sector.

What's Inside the Zine?

  • 3 new classes for the Mothership RPG
  • Unique loadouts for each class
  • New patches + trinkets
  • Salvage table
  • List of contractors w/ stats, motivation, etc.



Radio Hecate: A selection of songs you can use to create some Hecate Sector atmosphere.

NOTE: Physical copies coming soon to Tuesday Knight Games!
